search_input:
3. TEXT EDITOR

*A popular choice among developers, Sublime Text offers a wide range of features that make it an excellent option for coding, including a customizable interface, syntax highlighting, and code completion. The software also supports a variety of programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++. In addition, Sublime Text offers a robust package manager that allows users to easily install and manage plugins for added functionality.*

The software also supports a variety of programming languages, including Python, Java, and C++.
